text: We are are of a #powercut at #Pontllanfraith #NP12 and the surrounding areas. Engineers estimate 08:30 to restore the power. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Update: Apologies for the #powercut in #Newport and NP20 surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 09:00. Sorry for the delay

There  is  a #powercut in #LE5 Leicester & surrounding areas. We're working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 02:30. We're currently switching to restore power sooner, this results in customers seeing brief interruptions. Apologies for the disruption.
